snippet: The House of Representatives on Friday passed a bill legalizing gay marriage; it needs final approval from the State Senate, which has already a similar bill.
abstract: Hawaii's State House of Representatives passes bill to legalize same-sex marriage, all but ensuring that Hawaii will soon join 15 other states and District of Columbia in allowing gay couples to wed.
lead_paragraph: The House of Representatives on Friday passed a bill legalizing gay marriage; it needs final approval from the State Senate, which has already a similar bill.

headline.main: Hawaii Nears Approval of Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Hawaii Nears Approval of Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
